results.name: Expansion of bracket function.
comment: It appears that the sequence coincides with its third-order absolute difference. - _John W. Layman_, Sep 05 2003
It appears that, for n>0, the (unsigned) a(n) = 3*|A057682(n)| = 3*|Sum((-1)^j*binomial(n,3*j+1),j=0..floor(n/3))|. - _John W. Layman_, Sep 05 2003

formula: a(n) = sum(k=1..n, binomial(k,n-k)*(-3)^(k)) for n>0; a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 07 2011
